T02D3166:184a-1: rakta lo ke shva ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3166:184a-3: 'jig rten dbang phyug dmar po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya
T02D3166:184a-4: ba 'jig rten dbang phyug dmar po la phyag 'tshal
T02D3166:184a-5: lo // aom tshi ti tshi ti /
T02D3166:184a-6: bi klo li bi klo li /
T02D3166:184a-7: che ge mo 'khor dang bcas pa bdag gi dbang du 'gyur bar sgrubs sv'a h'a /
T02D3166:184a-8: sngon du 'gro ba khri phrag bzlas la phyi nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya ba'o //
T02D3166:184b-0: lho dang byang gi @184b ngos na lha mo sgrol
T02D3166:184b-1: ma dang khro gnyer can dang bcas pa'i rje btsun
T02D3166:184b-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku mdog dmar
T02D3166:184b-3: po dbyug pa dang phreng ba dang na bza' dmar
T02D3166:184b-4: po dang ldan pa phyag bzhin zhags pa dang lcags
T02D3166:184b-5: kyu dang mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa gcig tu sgeg
T02D3166:184b-6: pa'i snyim pa me tog dmar pos mdzes par gyur
T02D3166:184b-7: pa'i shing mya ngan med de'i drung na bzhugs par
T02D3166:184b-8: bdag nyid thun tshod gsum du bsam par bya ba'o
T02D3166:184b-9: // lan tshva dang aa hu ta'i zhes bya ba
T02D3166:184b-10: brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na skyes pa'am bud
T02D3166:184b-12: zhag bdun na dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D3166:184b-13: bdun phrag gsum gyis ni skyes bu chen po yang ngo //
T02D3166:184b-14: lan tshva dang bsres pa'i spra tshil gyi chad bu
T02D3166:184b-15: byas la sor bzhi'i tshad kyi gzugs brnyan byas te
T02D3166:184b-16: du ba med pa'i seng ldeng gi sol me la
T02D3166:184b-17: sngags zlo yin thun tshod gsum du sreg par gyur
T02D3166:184b-18: na gang gi ming byas pa dbang du 'gyur ro
T02D3166:184b-19: // rdo rje'i chus bsgos pa'i lan tshva la lan
T02D3166:184b-20: brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bsngags nas gang la
T02D3166:184b-21: byin par gyur pa des zos pa tsam nyid na
T02D3166:184b-23: 'jig rten dbang phyug dmar po'i sgrub thabs so /
